glsa.title: ADOdb: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ADOdb, all of which could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: ADOdb is an abstraction library for PHP creating a common API for a wide range of database backends.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ADOdb. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker, through the use of SQL injection or Cross Site Scripting (XSS) attacks, could execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ADOdb users should upgrade to the latest version:
